name: it, the
description:
This is 'it, the', a new video game from Outhouse Media.
What does Outhouse Media do? They bounce ideas off Reddit and direct them to developers, who take the ideas and put them in their games. Some of these games are awesome and some are virulent, but the point is that Outhouse Media is not behind any of these games any longer. Outhouse Media is a new company, but it already has a steep leg up on Kickstarter. They started last year with an exact $25,000 goal. This leaves everyone who backed their Kickstarter adventure with $16,000 full of cash. That's where the company stands now: $26,000 at the bottom of a pile of $30,000. The company was founded by Eriken Paul, when he found a stock photo on Facebook that he liked. When he posted, he had only raised $17,000. That gave him a few lessons to learn about crowdfunding. After years of my involvement in the game industry, I knew that I wanted to join forces with Outhouse Media to help promote their games, but none of that was confirmed until now. It's too soon to make predictions, but it seems like we may be seeing the company's first launch. The game Playing on Outhouse Media's, the first game, before we see it, is survival horror title, Thaumaturge. This game explores the little details that will make you think "This is what it's like to be a
